#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long
int main()
{
	ll i,t,n,q,ans,num,sum,l,r;
	scanf("%lld",&n);
	vector<ll> dp(n+1),v(n+1);
	sum=0;
	for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
	{
		scanf("%lld",&num);
		v[i]=num;
		sum+=num;
		dp[i]=sum;
	}
	scanf("%lld",&q);
	while(q--)
	{
		scanf("%lld%lld",&l,&r);
		ans=dp[r]-dp[l]+v[l];
		printf("%lld\n",ans);
	}
	return 0;
}
